column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Tenzin says : " Hello , Mother .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " That 's your grandmother , Meelo .
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's so good to see all of you .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Gran Gran , I 've been reading all about your old adventures .
#Text=I 've been dying to ask you : What happened to Zuko 's mom ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , Jinora , it 's an incredible tale -- " Ikki says : " Gran Gran , you look old .
#Text=How old are you ?
#Text=And why is it so cold in the South Pole ?
#Text=Can we make a campfire , and all huddle around it , and tell scary stories , and make snowmen ?
#Text=And then can you make the snowmen move with waterbending and chase us ?
#Text=Would n't that be fuuun ?
#Text=Huh ?
#Text=Would n't it ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Pema , let me help you .
#Text=Careful now , careful .
#Text=" Pema says : " Stop doting on me .
#Text=I 'm not helpless , I 'm just pregnant .
#Text=" Katara says : " The baby 's strong .
#Text=I see another airbender in your future .
#Text=" Pema says : " All I want is one child like me , a nice non-bender , who does n't blast wind in my face every five seconds .
#Text=" Meelo says : " Mommy , look , I 'm a snowbender !
#Text=" Pema says : " Were Tenzin and his siblings this crazy when they were kids ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Kya and Bumi certainly were , but Tenzin has always been ... rather serious .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Mother , please .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Korra ?
#Text=Look at you , so big and strong .
#Text=You 've grown into quite the young Avatar .
#Text=" Korra says : " Master Tenzin , I 'm so glad you 're here .
#Text=I ca n't wait to get started .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Yes , well ... " Pema says : " You 're going to have to tell her sooner or later .
#Text=" Korra says : " Tell me what ?
#Text=" Katara says : " You 're not staying , are you ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm afraid not .
#Text=We 're only visiting for the night .
#Text=Then I have to return to Republic City .
#Text=" Korra says : " But ... no , you 're supposed to move here .
#Text=You 're supposed to teach me .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm sorry , Korra .
#Text=Your airbending training is going to have to wait .
#Text=" Korra says : " So , how long until you 're ready to teach me airbending ?
#Text=A week ?
#Text=A month ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " It could be much longer .
#Text=" Korra says : " I do n't understand .
#Text=Why are you making me wait ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I have a responsibility to Republic City .
#Text=I am one of its leaders , and the situation there is very unstable right now .
#Text=" Korra says : " But you also have a responsibility to teach me .
#Text=Believe me , I 'd be happy to find another airbending master , but you 're the only one .
#Text=We 're stuck with each other .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I wish there were another way .
#Text=" Korra says : " Wait , there is !
#Text=If you ca n't stay here , then I 'll go back to Republic City with you !
#Text=It 's perfect !
#Text=" White Lotus leader says : " Absolutely not !
#Text=The city is far too dangerous .
#Text=Avatar Aang tasked us with keeping you safe while you mastered the four elements .
#Text=" Korra says : " I get that , but I do n't think keeping me locked up in this compound like a prisoner is what he had in mind .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I know this is difficult to accept , but it 's not the right time for you to come to the city .
#Text=" Korra says : " Whatever .
#Text="
